<jung>.name: Jung
<jung>.info: A rising young actor with refined features and a calm demeanor, he often portrays complex and introspective characters. His composed expressions reflect emotional depth and versatility.

<kim>.name: Kim
<kim>.info: She is an experienced actress known for her confident stance and sharp elegance. Her poised expressions convey strength and determination in every role.

<kong>.name: Kong
<kong>.info: A fresh and youthful actress, she radiates natural beauty and subtle charisma. Her expressive eyes suggest both innocence and emotional sensitivity.

<sul>.name: Sul
<sul>.info: With his dignified suit and serious expression, he exudes professionalism and authority. Often cast in leadership or villain roles, his strong aura commands attention.
